hi guys. celtics won. look like the score was 101-85. sandrunner u hav the option to not download the other games on the bittorrent u use. if your using bitTorrent 7.6, u would see a group of tabs on the bottom. click the files tab. then it'll show all files you r downloading. right clik on the file or files u dont wanna download n then clik "dont download". if u dont see those tabs at the bottom, thers a itty bitty double arrow on the bottm right corner that points up. clik on it. abra cadabra. lmao. THE FACTS: Brandon Bass had 18 of his 27 points in the third quarter, keying a second half comeback for the hosts as the Boston Celtics defeated the Philadelphia 76ers 101-85. With the win, Boston takes a 3-2 lead in the best-of-seven series. Bass matched his career high with the 27 points, and Kevin Garnett added 20 points and six rebounds as the Celts' cooled off a hot-shooting Sixers team in the second half, limiting them to just 35 points after the break. Rajon Rondo (13 points, 14 rebounds) added a double-double as Boston broke open the game in the fourth quarter, leading by as many as 20 points before coasting to the win. Elton Brand had a team-high 19 points for the Sixers in the defeat
